name: Terrorists Attacked: Army Team
description:
Terrorists Attacked: Army Team Fighting is an action packed Fps Shooting game of US Special Forces these special counter terrorist mission is to eliminate and destroy the terrorism in US country. These commando special force war is as destructive as any World War.
Features:
- First Person Shooter (FPS)
- Real Army commando action
- Various types of guns to fight with
- Easy and smooth controls
- Amazing 3D graphics
- Different levels of modern combat
